headings.text: Issue 1: Whether a contractual relationship between the plaintiff and the defendants is needed before the plaintiff seeks contribution under the Guarantees

Issue 3: Whether the alleged oppression by ANHINC and the contractual breaches by AMG are relevant to the defendants resisting contribution
Whether the plaintiff, ANHINC and AMG are one and the same
Whether there were oppressive acts by ANHINC and AMG
